May 19, 1959
Mr. James Day, General Manager
Station KQID
52$ Fourth Street
San Francisco 7, California
Dear Jim:
I know it’s late, but we just got permission from Ford to use a small balance
(some $3,000.00) for consultation use. We*11, of course, need to spread
even this small amount around. But I*d told you, February 16, that I*d let
you know as soon as we heard*
Are you still holding the workshop and would up to say $500,00 or so, for
consultant fees, help? An informal reply will be fine.
In haste.
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
